name: Wildest of the Wild
description: Being a deputy sheriff, you are finding yourself in a State where the real lawlessness and depravity is happening. Just try to survive and seize the power, destroying bandits on your way ...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 505 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 505 MB available space
